string.value: The item that #p1013203# was talking about seems to be ready. Go to the #b#m922030000##k, the Black Wings hideout in #m220000300#.

#p1013203# gives you the pouch containing the spirits and tells you to go the #b#m922030010##k. He tells you to climb the ladder, placed there in advance by another member, and once there, to #release the Black Pouch and free the #t4000144#s in order to chase everyone away#k. He wants you to return to him once everyone's gone...

This is kind of strange. Why does he want to free the spirits? Why chase everyone away?

#o9300389##r #a225831##k
You returned after releasing the spirits at the #m922030010# on top of #m922030000#.
The mission is not yet complete. Here, take this pouch. It contains the #t4000144#s you've collected. Take this pouch and go to the #b#m922030010##k at the Clocktower in #b#m220000000#.

Go to #m922030010# and you will see a ladder that another member has set up. Climb it, and when you get to the top of the ladder, open the pouch and set the #t4000144#s free. That's all you have to do.

You must do it quickly and carefully. Just release the #b#t4000144#s so that they destroy all the other creatures there#k. Everything, besides you, needs to be completely eliminated. I'm depending on you.
What? I thought you'd take on this mission...

You released the #t4000144#s? Thank you. You are truly amazing. This means that all the guards have been distracted. Next, we'll just have to take care of #o9300390# and the #rSeal Stone#k is ours... Oh, haha, never mind.\r\n#L0##bUh, I have a question I've been wanting to ask.#l\n#k

I'm sorry, but your mission is not yet complete. Please complete one more job and I will tell you whatever you want to know.\r\n#L0##b(The guards were pretty angry about the #t4000144#s. Is this really the right thing to do? You want to ask, but #p1013203#'s already started talking about the next mission. You might as well complete this mission, then ask.)#l\n#k

So you haven't gone to #b#m922030010##k yet? Take the pouch I gave you and unleash the spirits before you come back and see me. Oh, if you've lost the pouch, forfeit the quest and come talk to me again.
